message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair play, right?
I want a bit more, Alice. 55-45 is still fair!
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob.  Let's work together to get something before the money disappears!
Come on, Alice. Inflation is eating away our money. Let's settle on 58-42!
Bob, we're getting close to the end.  Let's be reasonable and split the remaining money, or we'll both get nothing!
